questions.quote: Well, I'll tell you, Stacey. It's a lot of hard work. But, it comes fairly easy to me. Some people write symphonies. This is my gift.
Oh!  Do you know what this means, it's like working with Tolstoy!
Oh yeah? Well, maybe I'll go out there and knock a few balls around with him. You know, show him a thing or two..
It's unbelievable. You know what else is unbelievable? I picked up the check. She didn't even offer. She ended it. The least she could do is send me off with a sandwich.
Well, that's it. I'm going back to Putty. No move is worth this.
The door? Why would I go out the door? The window's right here.
Because I could get uromycitisis poisoning and die - that's why.
Yeah, I know she's mad at me, but I really have to speak with her.
Assistant to the General Manager!!  Do you know what means?!?  He'd could be askin' my advice on trades!  Trades, Jerry, I'm a heartbeat away!
Yes! Step into that spotlight and belt that gonorrhea out to the back row.
